stork.feather.util

Class Pipes

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.util.Pipes

  • public final class Pipes
extends Object
    A utility class for creating Pipes, Taps, and Sinks for various purposes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Pipes.AggregatorSink
      A Sink which receives and aggregates Slices.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Pipe aggregatorPipe()
      A Pipe which aggregates multiple, randomly-ordered Slices into a single Slice which it drains on completion.
      static Pipes.AggregatorSink aggregatorSink()
      Get an AggregatorSink for an anonymous Resource.
      static Tap tapFromSlice(Resource root, Slice slice)
      Create a Tap which emits the given Slice for the given Resource root.
      static Tap tapFromSlice(Slice slice)
      Create an anonymous Tap which emits a single Slice to an attached Sink.
      static Tap tapFromString(Object object)
      Create an anonymous Tap which emits the String representation of an object encoded as UTF-8.
      static Tap tapFromString(Object object, Charset charset)
      Create an anonymous Tap which emits the String representation of an object encoded using charset.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • tapFromSlice

        public static Tap tapFromSlice(Slice slice)
        Create an anonymous Tap which emits a single Slice to an attached Sink. If slice is null, the returned Tap will initialize the attached Sink, but will not emit any Slices.
        Parameters:
        slice - the Slice emitted by the returned Tap.
        Returns:
        An anonymous Tap which will emit slice.

      • tapFromSlice

        public static Tap tapFromSlice(Resource root,
               Slice slice)
        Create a Tap which emits the given Slice for the given Resource root.

      • tapFromString

        public static Tap tapFromString(Object object)
        Create an anonymous Tap which emits the String representation of an object encoded as UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to stringify and emit.
        Returns:
        An anonymous Tap which will emit object as a String encoded using UTF-8.

      • tapFromString

        public static Tap tapFromString(Object object,
                Charset charset)
        Create an anonymous Tap which emits the String representation of an object encoded using charset.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to stringify and emit.
        charset - the Charset to use for encoding.
        Returns:
        An anonymous Tap which will emit object as a String using charset.

      • aggregatorPipe

        public static Pipe aggregatorPipe()
        A Pipe which aggregates multiple, randomly-ordered Slices into a single Slice which it drains on completion.

      • aggregatorSink

        public static Pipes.AggregatorSink aggregatorSink()
        Get an AggregatorSink for an anonymous Resource.
